Text.Page:
We must get someone inside the garden and stop the argons from getting a hold of the Everbloom!

Quickly speak to Doran, thoughâ€”the Mysterium has something they say will help you.

, the Mysterium is very interested in how the argons penetrated Isren's garden.

Take this monitoring device inside and keep it with you at all times. It will give the researchers out here information about the argons you encounter.

That way, if we have to send someone else in...

Oh! I'm sure you'll do fine.

Are you ready? The entrance is ahead on the left.

If you can keep up, I'll guide you there. Try not to get lost.

You made it! This teleportal and your key will take you inside the garden.

I can see the way is clear for you just beyond the entrance, but trouble is just beyond that.

We're counting on you, . Find and destroy whatever the argons have sent in there.

Doran and I were monitoring you, .

I'm so relieved knowing the garden and the Everbloom are safe.

Do you know who else will be excited by this news? Tanseril in Scythera Fae. Go tell him!

You saved not only a sacred memorial to our goddess, but the source of fey magic.

I can't even fathom what would have happened to Seeliewood, or to Shara, if you hadn't stopped the argons. Can you imagine?

Let's hope we never have to find out.
